official_title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Army to convey to the trustees of the Salem Wesleyan Church a certain parcel of land of the United States at the Jim Woodruff Dam and Reservoir project, Florida.

summary.text: Amends the Act providing for the retention of certain lands in Jackson County, Florida, for fish, wildlife, and recreational purposes to authorize the Secretary of the Army to convey a portion of such retained lands to the trustees of the Salem Wesleyan Church. Requires the trustees to pay the fair market value for such land.

titles.title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Army to convey to the trustees of the Salem Wesleyan Church a certain parcel of land of the United States at the Jim Woodruff Dam and Reservoir project, Florida.
